message:
Hi everyone,
Wanted to share some puzzle platform examples from my game Space Platform, a first person platformer coming to iOS 24 June 2015. What do you think ? Does the game look good ? The platform puzzles challenging ?
story: Ahmed Imam shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Space Platform 3D - First Person Platformer for IOS (24 June 2015) - Gameplay Puzzle Platforms
caption: youtube.com
description: Hi, This is an edited game play footage from our new game "Space Platform". The game is a first person platformer set in a post apocalyptic future after the ...
